title: Elo Hell is real
body:
Pls, I guess i don't pray to RNGeus enough because i flat out get teammates that will 

1) intentionally lose the game if they are not fed
2) Refuse to silence themselves. if you spend more time typing than clicking, you are doing something wrong.
3) Will not follow advice, especially form the person doing the best.

guess i'll just keep farming my kda.
